## WchNgParentFrameReduxStoreModule class

Module that exposes an implementation of `WCH_TOKEN_REDUX_STORE`<!-- -->. The implementation accesses the store from the parent iframe. Prerequisite is that the parent (the shell) and the application that uses this module run on the same origin.

Depends on: `WCH_TOKEN_EDIT_HOST_WINDOW`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class WchNgParentFrameReduxStoreModule 
```
